channel.title: abstract class on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in abstract class on Some Title

item.title: Abstract class
item.description: ```py import abc class Car(metaclass=abc.ABCMeta): def init(self,model=None): self.model = model @abc.abstractmethod def run(self): pass class ToyotaCar(Car): def init(self, model,enable_auto_run=False): super().init(model) self.enable_auto_run = enable_auto_run #If you do not override it in the inherited class, an error will occur when you create an object def run(self): print('fast fun') toyota_car = ToyotaCar(‘Lexus’)
